channel.title: Notifications on Awaiting Bits
channel.description: Recent content in Notifications on Awaiting Bits

item.title: How to lower the volume of the annoying Windows 10 notifications
item.description: I bought a laptop a long time ago but I never really used it enough to notice this. I am now using it every day and every time a Windows 10 notification shows up, both my ears bleed (not really but you get the idea). The volume of these notifications is EXTREMELY loud.
